Description: Iron-covered wooden slip-case for a book; probably a gospel-casket; cross stamped on each side; Coptic inscription above and below cross; pattern around three sides.
Curator's comments: Cf. Cairo, Coptic Museum, inv. 11487, 1565, 4867 (publ. G. Gabra & M. Eaton-Krauss, The Treasures of Coptic Art, Cairo 2007, cat. 120, 121, 131).
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
